blogPosts.title: TEST VERSION: Stories and testimonies of Italian soldiers who fought and perished in the Great War
blogPosts.description: Following the ‘Documenting the Great War‘ blogpost, Istituto Centrale per il Catalogo Unico delle Biblioteche Italiane e per le Informazioni Bibliografiche (ICCU) – Central Institute for the Union Catalogue (ICCU) highlights some of the memories contributed by citizens at the ‘Seminario formativo e raccolta di fotografie, lettere, ricordi della Grande guerra’ community collection day held in Rome at the National Central Library on 5 May 2013

blogPosts.title: The Past But Not As You Know It
blogPosts.description: A child riding a hog, doctors trying to locate a bullet using a telephone probe, David Bowie performing with a pirate eye patch, and before and after pictures of nose jobs from the early 20th century. Not strange enough? What about professional rat-catchers from Liverpool at work or people painting the Eiffel Tower by hand?Our photo exhibition takes you on a journey to the past; the past like you’ve never seen it before. Explore the exhibition.
